postcards_description: Get a free Bitcoin Postcard Pack and share Bitcoin with someone you know.
postcards_program_closed_message: Our free Bitcoin postcard program has ended. Thank you to everyone who participated in spreading Bitcoin education through the mail!
postcards_sticker_alternative_message: Continue spreading Bitcoin awareness with our free sticker program! Our Bitcoin stickers are perfect for sharing in public spaces and come with QR codes linking to educational content.
postcards_instructions_4: We made these postcards to make it easier for you to introduce someone you know to Bitcoin! Just add an address and a stamp and drop your postcard in the mail.
postcards_instructions_5: Our mission is to accelerate Bitcoin adoption. You can help by getting free stickers and placing them in public spaces!
postcards_instructions_6: We all know a few people who could benefit from learning more about Bitcoin. Share Bitcoin stickers with them today!
